H0.text: Who in the Bible is the mother of Mary, the mother of Jesus. Elizabeth

H1.text: Who in the Bible is the mother of Mary, the mother of Jesus. Jochebed

H2.text: Who in the Bible is the mother of Mary, the mother of Jesus. Deborah

H3.text: Who in the Bible is the mother of Mary, the mother of Jesus. Anne

A4.text: According to Christian tradition, Saint Anne was the mother of Mary, the wife of Joachim and the maternal grandmother of Jesus.

A5.text: Mary's mother is not named in the Bible's canonical gospels.
